languages.text: {n}Горячее дыхание почти обжигает вашу кожу.{/n} "Заниматься подобным у всех на глазах... неприемлемо". {n}Кассия не отстраняется, лишь склоняет голову набок, позволяя прильнуть к ее нетерпеливым губам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Горячее дыхание почти обжигает вашу кожу.{/n} "Заниматься подобным у всех на глазах... неприемлемо". {n}Кассия не отстраняется, лишь склоняет голову набок, позволяя прильнуть к ее нетерпеливым губам.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Горячее дыхание почти обжигает вашу кожу.{/n} "Заниматься подобным у всех на глазах... неприемлемо". {n}Кассия не отстраняется, лишь склоняет голову набок, позволяя прильнуть к ее нетерпеливым губам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her eager lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her eager lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her eager lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Su aliento es cálido y te quema la piel.{/n} «Hacer esto delante de todos... no es decoroso». {n}Pero en vez de apartarse, Cassia inclina la cabeza a un lado para que puedas presionar tu boca contra sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su aliento es cálido y te quema la piel.{/n} «Hacer esto delante de todos... no es decoroso». {n}Pero en vez de apartarse, Cassia inclina la cabeza a un lado para que puedas presionar tu boca contra sus labios expectantes.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女の熱い吐息が火傷のように肌を温める。{/n}「他の方たちが見ている前でこんなことをするなんて…恥ずかしいです」{n}カシアは離れようとせず、ただ首を横に傾げ、口づけを求めて唇を差し出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の熱い吐息が火傷のように肌を温める。{/n}「他の方たちが見ている前でこんなことをするなんて…恥ずかしいです」{n}カシアは離れようとせず、ただ首を横に傾げ、口づけを求めて唇を差し出す。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她温热的呼吸拂过你的皮肤。{/n}“在众目睽睽之下做这件事情……真是太不体面了。”{n}但卡西娅并没有抽身离开，而是将头微微朝你靠了过去，允许你亲吻她的双唇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她温热的呼吸拂过你的皮肤。{/n}“在众目睽睽之下做这件事情……真是太不体面了。”{n}但卡西娅并没有抽身离开，而是将头微微朝你靠了过去，允许你亲吻她渴切的双唇。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Son souffle chaud vous brûle la peau.{/n} « Il est... inconvenant de faire pareille chose aux yeux de tous. » {n}Cassia ne se retire pas, mais se contente de pencher la tête sur le côté pour vous permettre de presser votre bouche contre ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son souffle chaud vous brûle la peau.{/n} « Il est... inconvenant de faire pareille chose aux yeux de tous. » {n}Cassia ne se retire pas, mais se contente de pencher la tête sur le côté pour vous permettre de presser votre bouche contre ses lèvres avides.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihr heißer Atem verbrennt deine Haut.{/n} "Das vor aller Augen zu tun ... ist unziemlich." {n}Cassia weicht nicht zurück, sondern legt nur den Kopf ein wenig zur Seite, so dass du deinen Mund gegen ihre Lippen pressen kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr heißer Atem verbrennt deine Haut.{/n} "Das vor aller Augen zu tun ... ist unziemlich." {n}Cassia weicht nicht zurück, sondern legt nur den Kopf ein wenig zur Seite, so dass du deinen Mund gegen ihre begierigen Lippen pressen kannst.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın sıcak nefesinden tenin yanıyor.{/n} "Herkesin gözünün önünde bunu yapmak... Yakışık almıyor." {n}Cassia geri çekilmiyor. Onun yerine başını yana eğip dudaklarını dudaklarıyla kavuşturmana izin veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her heated breath burns your skin.{/n} "Doing this in full view of everyone... it is unseemly." {n}Cassia does not pull away, but merely tilts her head to the side, allowing you to press your mouth against her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın sıcak nefesinden cildin yanıyor.{/n} "Herkesin gözünün önünde bunu yapmak... Yakışık almıyor." {n}Cassia geri çekilmiyor. Onun yerine başını yana çevirip dudaklarını dudaklarıyla kavuşturmana izin veriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
